mapper.insert: insert into insurancemoney (id, bank_account, resident_registration_card, receipt, medical_certificate, contract_id, bank_name, process_status, apply_date) values (#{id}, #{bank_account}, #{resident_registration_card}, #{receipt}, #{medical_certificate}, #{contract_id}, #{bank_name}, #{process_status}, #{apply_date})
mapper.update: update insurancemoney set bank_account = #{bank_account}, resident_registration_card = #{resident_registration_card}, receipt = #{receipt}, medical_certificate = #{medical_certificate}, contract_id = #{contract_id}, bank_name = #{bank_name}, process_status = #{process_status}, apply_date = #{apply_date} where id = #{id}
